documents.document: #USER# Great idea! Looks delish..
#USER# #USER# That's awesome. I can't wait to listen in.
#USER# I realize I've been assuming & referring to you as Jenn but never asked you. Thank you Jenn! 😊
#USER# Looks like a beautiful day ahead... And a very Gooooood Morning to you Victor! "Fall down seven times. Stand up eight." ~ Japanese Proverb (My go to thought when I'm in doubt)

Good Morning...
"Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself." ~ George Bernard Shaw
You're the artist of your masterpiece.🖌Create something beautiful.
#HASHTAG#
#USER# Sure you do. Go...Go... Go.... the BD Dungeon is waiting for you! You got this 🙌🏼💪🏼 oh, then dinner. 😉
Almost a perfect session.🥊 Feeling soooo good! HAPPY dance time... 💃🏻 #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

Good Morning... it's Friday & time to dance this workday out.
Make it a great day & wear that smile! 😊

#USER# I know Victor. My apologies if that didn't come across, I tried to say that in so many words. Not many do what they love or pursue it, so I sincerely admire that about you. I just say it like I see or feel it.

Anyone else order #USER# two dozen of your favorite toothbrushes, buy a year supply of mouthwash & dental floss at the start of the pandemic? Yes, I was one of those people. Gotta have a great smile behind the mask. 😷 #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#

*** BAY AREA/PENINSULA ***
Looking for a place that offers basic Boxing workout sessions. 🥊
For recommendations of a place, please drop in comments. Name/contact info of a legit trainers (ONLY), provide info in DM to protect anonymity. Thank you!
#HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#
Stimulus check??? Oh, I don't know; maybe lost in the mail since 2020... 🧐
Drove my nieces car into the city (it's 10 yo.) never realized how spoiled I am. I had to use a key to start & drive it & no navigation; actually used brainpower to remember where I was going! 🙃😂

#USER# Thank you Jenn. Definitely a relief since I'm back & forth to the hospital right now. I was in Santa Clara a couple weeks ago & planned to stop by as a walk-in but got there too late. Happy to hear all is good with you. I agree, this cold rain 🥶 I could use some relief too.
Nothing like the Niners forcing you to hold your breath for an extended period of time... Way to go #HASHTAG# !🙌🏼🥳🏈🏈
Had one of the best days but I can't shake these teary eyes. My goodness... I'm getting on my own nerves!😬 #HASHTAG#
#USER# That's awesome!! I'm a big Mickey fan/collector and have several watches too. ❤ Happy Holidays 💫
#USER# A big storm is to come thru tomorrow night. I'm going to avoid the roads as much as I can. Stay safe!

The last couple months I've tried Instacart as an option for some grocery items & I just noticed I have more text activity with weekly Instacart Shoppers then with family & friends. 🤦🏻‍♀️😂 Go figure! #HASHTAG#

#USER# I do. I usually check throughout the day. My investments are baby play compared to you. 😂 But every lil bit builds. Right? This & the lotto... Still working on that semi early retirement for us.🙌🏼 😉
Seeing the happy thru an unexpected smile makes the difference. #HASHTAG# #URL#
#USER# I happen to read an article and surprisingly I had some of the characteristics. 🙂 I feel good about that.

Overslept, under the weather & it's gloomy... Not gonna let it take me down, the sun is shining somewhere. Bob Marley to start the day! ☮
Make it a wonderful Sunday! #URL#
#USER# Managers are so blinded by that. I've cautioned managers about this very thing but they can be hard headed. And then they wonder why Employee Engagement Survey results are below par.
#USER# Beautiful and I love your selection of quotes you pair with each photo. Thank you for that daily treat. Have a wonderful day!

#USER# I know that feeling, I lived in a two story home, main living on top & it was brutal with the heat. I can only imagine how hard it is working in a mask all day. Hang in there! Stay safe & hydrated!
#USER# FYI - Safeway & Whole Foods has fresh prepared items like grilled chicken, meats, veggies & some carbs. You can do some meal prep with LF spices to get you by. Just a thought.
Yes, yes I did! Placed my order...🤫 #HASHTAG# #URL#

Good Morning...
Let your light and heart shine bright today. 🌟💕 #HASHTAG# #URL#
It's that time... Pjs, 🍿 and Chapelwaite binge. #URL#
So why didn't I use another vacation day? Oh, that's right... because who wouldn't enjoy an EVEN longer weekend. Ugh! Happy Friday! 🙃 #HASHTAG# #URL#
Oops... My apologies. Did I roll my eyes? #URL#
#USER# BTW - misplaced the packaging, that why I'm asking.
#USER# That's the energy I'm feeling too. But I can't make sense of it yet. I hope it's a sign of something positive. Happy Sunday Jenn!
#USER# just a Hello! Making sure all is a-ok with ya. Happy Friday 🙂
There's got to be something to save my crazy morning. Like a view of moody sky... #URL#
Wouldn't ya know it... Now the garage door. #HASHTAG#
Rise & shine, count your blessings and smile a smile for me... Happy Sunday! #URL#

Nothing more insulting than an amazing sports car driving 40 mph in front of me on the highway.🤨 There's four wide open lanes, please drive the sh** out of that car!!! Earn the damn ticket... #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
#USER# No doubt a rough day Scott. My thoughts and prayers are with you & your family.

#USER# 😂🤣😂 where are you finding this? I searched so I could send one back but nada.
Ok... let's go with HUBBA HUBBA! 🥰 #URL#
#USER# Buenos días Victor! Make your Monday shine like only you can. Sending smiles × 1000! I know... a little cheesy. 😏😊
#USER# I was being lighthearted in my comment. I guess there's no more friendly or silly exchange.

Eating breakfast & the table six feet away is a lady monopolizing the conversation of six people (loudly). It's really none of my business but I feel inclinded to chime in to level the playing field. I didn't & wouldn't. But lady, please take a breath! 😂 #HASHTAG#
#USER# I'm certain you still look like the handsome you either way. 🙊🙃

Back on track and it feels great!! #USER# workouts never let's me down... Easy to do, effective with great results. Something for everyone at any workout level.
#HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
#URL#
Ok... this made a really rough day much brighter. Love this lil guy's determination to make it happen!! BRAVO 👏🏼 👏🏼 👏🏼 😍 #URL#
Just when I thought I received no Valentine's wishes, I opened my email this morning & don't ya know it... the world of SPAM loves me. 🙄 #URL#
I'm loving this cool breeze flowing thru my window. Me & my cozy blanket feels all right! ☺ oh wait... the interruption of work will change that. Lol... #HASHTAG#
#USER# Agreed... The most comical entertainment in Vegas! 😂
Why can't everyday be a good hair day? 🥴

Good Morning brave hearts...
"Allow yourself to bend like a willow in the wind, so you will not break." ~ Unknown
#HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#
#USER# Thank you Jenn for your kindness. 🙏🏼 Not only a special person to me but so many as well. The outpouring of love & support has been overwhelming.
Good Morning... Have a marvelous day! Smile & shine. 💫

#USER# The last few years it's been a complete lifestyle change for me & that journey continues still with ups & downs. The time factor is also my biggest challenge but it's only occasional now. Thank goodness! 😁

When my confidence is at odds, I turn to my determination. ⚖ I didn't surpass my personal best today but keeping my balance against heavy wind was a challenge of its own.🥴😂 Yikes! It was sooo bad.. #HASHTAG# #URL#
#USER# Sad time. 😔 I remember my grandpa always talking about Madden growing up not far from their neighborhood in DC.
My relatives love to tell me I'm stubborn ♉. Not true, I'm open to discussing why I'm always right. End of discussion... It works everytime! 😂 #HASHTAG#
And the stupidity of illegal fireworks continues at 335 am. Not like I'm sleepy or anything. And let's not forget the best part, waking up startled with your heart racing. Yeah that! #HASHTAG#
#USER# #USER# 😂😂 you gotta come by the neighborhood on Mondays and I'll buy ya one.🍦
Missed the SuperBowl and halftime but worth it. After a difficult few weeks, it was nice spending time with my mom & taking her out for the day. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
Perfect. Black is about 90% of all my clothing. 😂 Mystery solved, I'm confident! #URL#
#USER# Good Morning Victor! Have the best of the best kind of.... everything, everyday. 😉 Dr. Suess-ish
#USER# Dark chocolate, please & thank you. 🙏🏼 Feel free to drone my way!
#USER# I get it. Maybe one day that will change again. Anyway, hello... how are ya today?

First time taking a walk this dark at 5:00pm. And, people in the neighborhood are scolding me for not wearing my reflective gear & carrying pepper spray. But I have a mask if I need it! 😷😂 When you see this on your walk, not so bad. ⬇️ #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#
From WFH pj's to the oh so stylish workout attire... 😂😂
Always an awesome feeling to look at your Fitbit Sleep Tracker to see how well you're NOT sleeping. 🥴 #HASHTAG#
#USER# A Gooood Morning to my favorite early 🐦! Missed ya
#USER# It definitely does. Once you get comfortable with solitude it makes a world of difference for soul healing.

Good Morning...
Write it on your ❤
“Do your little bit of good where you are; it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.” ~ Desmond Tutu
#HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
#USER# A very Goooood Morning to you! 😊 Enjoy a productive day but don't forget to slow down just a lil.
#USER# #USER# And, Jenn too! Two GREAT humans in my book... 🙂

#USER# You are for sure blessed & absolutely true, let it fall. Although my dream growing up was signing & musicianship, not my blessing nor my journey. But the love for it on all levels, always there!
Can I find your music on Spotify? I'd like to check it out.

I don't pretend to know all the rules, regs, violations there is in any given sport & not trying to impress. I know just enough so I have fun watching & make blind bets, winning with beginners luck. I don't see a problem with this but many do. What am I missing?
#HASHTAG#
#USER# True, but on a brighter note, if you're taking 280 in, at least on a sunny day like today, it can be a beautiful drive. I know the commute can be rough. Sending a BIG ⬇️ your way. #URL#
It's time... thinking of ending the longest relationship I've ever had. 💔 Yeah, no... I love potato chips! #HASHTAG#
#USER# You're brave Jenn! Some of those shoppers may have been wearing those too.. 😂

A very sad day 😔 RIP 🙏🏼💫
"NFL legend John Madden passes away aged 85" #URL#
Pretty sure I don't want to roll out of bed & commute 20 ft to work tomorrow....😔 #HASHTAG#
On FB people find my sarcasm hilarious... who knows why. Here, not so much. 😂🤣😂 #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

Good Morning...
Remember to embrace the just breathe moments... #URL#

I'm disappointed that I missed the Warriors game, but a quick trip to an empty Home Depot was worth it. In & out!!! Kept my sanity and new lights will be installed tomorrow. Almost finished. #HASHTAG#

Mayor of Kingstown #USER# is intense! 😬 I'm hooked. #USER# is fantastic.
#HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
#USER# Oh, Victor you're so silly!! 😂😝😂 I like the play & relax idea... No thinking needed!
#USER# 😔 that's my favorite part! Lol... The bright side? Better for the environment.

What's crazy? Feeling a little under the weather with constant banging of a roof being replaced and a rumbling of the Blue Angels flying over the house.
I ♥️ renovation & the Blue Angels. It's a GREAT day! 😂🤣
#HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#
#USER# wishing you a Good Morning & a really great day! Take care & smiles...☺️

For as far back as I can remember me & my grandpa would sing this together. Feeling sentimental.😔 #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
#URL# #URL#
#USER# Good Morning... And, how are you on this early day? 🐦😊

Spread good cheer in your community. There is so much healing needed. It's the little things with a touch of love & care that can brighten a holiday. This project is for a local shelter who offers temporary housing for displaced adults. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#
What are me & my grandma (96 years young) doing? Watching "A Very Boy Band Holiday". I get the feeling she only wanted to watch it for me. 💖 #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#

#USER# I hope that means you're good. I have a tendency to grind my teeth so the dentist appointments are always fun. 🙄 Lol...
And 👋🏼 Hello
Yep.. I'm in trouble.😂 The young one of the crowd & I guess I'm never growing up. #HASHTAG#
First qtr of the Niner game, I head to the grocery store. Fastest shopping trip ever! Don't judge... I'm a fan, sporting my Jimmy G (T👕) #HASHTAG#
Feeling motivated for an early morning walk, but hoping I don't cross paths with a coyote today. Things I mentally prepare myself for.🙄 #HASHTAG#
#USER# I saw two Samsung tonight & at a good price. Maybe I'll go back and pick one up tomorrow. I trust your judgement more than mine. Thank you for the recommendation! 👍🏼

#USER# It might seem silly but I always feel a sense of pride for you when I read your words of encouragement in support of someone & the recognition of your journey!! You're strong, you're blessed & a blessing to many. Sigue inspirando 🙏🏼💫💕
#USER# #USER# #USER# Wishing you a safe & healthy holiday season. 🙏🏼💫 #URL#
#USER# Awesome! I finally have something to be appreciated for, for the rest of my life... 😂🙃
#USER# I know!! The whole neighborhood is feeling the same way. 😂 You can hear everyone shouting out.
#USER# #USER# Congrats Mike. You're seven months strong & counting... You got this!! 🙏🏼
#USER# Finally. 🙌🏼 my first two appointments were rescheduled. Hope you're doing well Jenn! #URL#
Gotta love it... When your groceries are ready before you are. 😂 Thought about going in my pjs. #HASHTAG# #URL#
#USER# Thank you so much! 🙂 Have a great day Kayjay.
Beautiful skies amidst the jungle of power lines... Photos taken a minute apart, North & South. #HASHTAG# #URL#
Well... because sometimes. 😝😂 Chocolate makes everything better! #HASHTAG# #URL#
Who knew scheduling a COVID vaccine appointment would be as much fun as buying a PS5. Just great... 🙄 #URL#

For Christmas my family pulls a name and calls this activity Secret Santa. Really? They blurt out the name. And, when I don't, they play a game of Clue until they figure it out.🤦🏻‍♀️ Does anyone else deal with this holiday cuckooness? 😂🤣
#HASHTAG#❤ #HASHTAG#
#USER# Thank you! Keep the stories coming... love em'
My reality... Pan dulce is an unsweetened mint iced tea from Starbucks. 🥴
Late night study session for tomorrows system certification.😬🤞🏼🍀 #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
#USER# I almost never do that. Hopefully momentary. Hope you're doing well Anna! 🙂

My contractor reminds me so much of my grandpa; work ethic, kind demeanor, pride of work etc.. For weeks he's admired my grandpa's decades old tools. So I took a deep breath, let go & gave him the tools. The smile said it all! 🙏🏼 My grandpa would be so happy. #HASHTAG#

Dare I do it? 🥶 Hot tea ✔ Fave hoodie. Where are you?🤦🏻‍♀️ Need warmer walking clothes. ✔
Here goes nothing... #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#
#USER# It's such a welcoming sight. I hope all is well Anna 🙂
#USER# #USER# Awesome! I'm a little jealous. Have fun and be safe out there.

Off to the Costco Business Center I go. Another kind of crazy today!
I got this fortune for a reason, so let there be this ⬇️ while I shop. #URL#

#USER# So you liked driving my nieces car? 😂🤣😂 (jk) Recently, I borrowed her car & I was a little lost for the same reasons. Oh, I don't know... something off about using a key to start it up! Lol... #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

Good Morning...

When data & spreadsheets never sleep... it's late night fun & waking up a sleepy mess. 🥴 Time to smile & to do it all again! #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

Let your determination take you there! 📸
#USER# I love those days in the City. Your photo makes miss working there. Great photo! 😊

#USER# Buenas Victor! I saw this over the weekend & thought 💬 this might help get you out of "Mondays su**" mode. So I saved it for today. But you don't need my annoying bit of positivity after all. 😊 Happy Monday! #URL#
These days, cleaning up my life is clearing out text messages, emails, voicemails & photos. 🙄🤦🏻‍♀️ Time well spent.

Good Morning...
Keep your heart open, share your light, lift up with compassion & kindness. #HASHTAG#
#URL#
#USER# I sent a ghost hug your way earlier... not sure if that counts. 👻🤷🏻‍♀️

Good Morning...
Share your grace.💫 #HASHTAG# #URL#

Attended a friends wedding ceremony via Zoom. However it's done, it shows me as long as there's friendship, unconditional love, support & partnership amonst the couple; they had all they ever needed for a beautiful day as they start their journey together. 💗🙏🏼💫 #HASHTAG#
#USER# A1. Lemon, cucumber & mint water. 🍋🥤 #HASHTAG#
#USER# Right? 😂💥🤣💥😂 I can't. I developed a tree nut allergy a few years ago. I loved the ones from Trader Joe's. I know, I know...😥

#USER# Great photo Anna! Have a wonderful weekend. Also, I've been meaning to tell you that construction is being done on the bay trail at Coyote Point. Once completed, maybe we can finally meet up for a walk. 🙂
And this Elf is off to meet the Elf Team for toy drop off! 🎁🧸 Forever grateful for my family & friends who share & give of their hearts. 💕 #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
My Friday vibe... making it a great day! #HASHTAG# #URL#

#USER# #USER# Hi Mike! She's doing pretty well considering she's never been on her own & away from family; as well as working thru her continued recovery. I'm so proud of her! I hear the maturity in her voice everytime we talk. 🥲 Thank you for asking.
How's Megan doing?
Just freakin' great!! Get to my mom's to find a car blocking the driveway entry enough that my car doesn't fit & no street parking anywhere.😠🥺 #HASHTAG#
#USER# Right??? If you're gonna put your business out there; an inquiring mind wants to know!! 😂💁🏻‍♀️
#USER# Mushrooms, red bell, shallots & garlic sautéed in a little red wine & brown sugar, topped off with Italian sausage. My mom is a happy camper. 😊
#USER# You should have called, I would have shared. 💁🏻‍♀️Still have plenty...

Happy Saturday!
Just a little cheesy Halloweenie humor... #HASHTAG# #URL#

#USER# Well, I'm excited for you. You've been waiting awhile.. I hope you find a used one you like. If you need help driving one of those new Tesla'a home; just sayin' I might be available to help ya! 😂😉😂

Good Morning... 💕
"A loving heart is the truest wisdom." ~ Charles Dickens
#HASHTAG#
Now to redeem this awful day with a DIY manicure. Oh, what fun! 🙄 #HASHTAG#

What a fun morning #USER# Toy & Christmas Stocking drop off. The Firefighters took the time to give the kids a treasured experience. Joining the Elf Team this year, Foster City Flash Softball (8U) & local Girl Scout Troop. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#
#USER# I know... wishful thinking. 😔 Can't give up on hope.
#USER# Hello Katina! Hope you & your family are staying safe & healthy. 🤗
#USER# Stupid, stupid papers!! 😝 BTW - I hope you know I wasn't serious about you being grumpy. Just banter, that's it.
#USER# Really? I didn't think anyone liked em'... 😂 thank you! Just followed back.
Tonight I took apart my mom's old PC equipment. Ugh! Every piece of it was heavy & soooo many wires. 🙄🤦🏻‍♀️
The Home Depot... Always an adventure. Why did I forget my product labels. Just great! I'll buy 10 items by memory & return 9. 😂🙃 #HASHTAG#

Quiet house, morning workout, long shower & breakfast. Perfecto!
#HASHTAG#

Another push yourself, feel good workout. So happy I stumbled across #USER# workout guides. This fitness resource has been the most effective workout along with some workout equipment. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

It's been over two years since I've been to my favorite Italian place. The table near me was two older couples who could not relax because I was eating alone & insisted I join them.🤦🏻‍♀️Super nice but they had so many questions. 😂 #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

I completely thru off the staff at my breakfast spot. I'm here on a weekday at lunch time, ordering breakfast, out of my walking attire & in casual wear with hair not a hot mess and wearing makeup. 😳 The unexpected is something else!! 😂🤣 #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

#USER# 😂🤣😂🤣 hey, hey, hey...don't start celebrating, we're having?? 👇🏼 Twins! 😳😂😝😂 Did ya get your Pizza ingredients? You didn't read my last reply, I challenged you to a future Pizza cook-off. 👩🏻‍🍳🍕👨🏻‍🍳😁 #URL#
#USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# 🙌🏼 Thank goodness. It's not only about playing the game, that young man needs to protect & keep himself healthy wherever & whatever he's doing.

#USER# A4. I personally prefer in person development. I learn best interacting. However, like many, I've had to adapt to an ever changing HR world and the pandemic accelerated a remote world for me. A challenging change but I'm adapting. #HASHTAG#

#USER# I can't begin to tell you how happy I am to read this Victor. Sharing my knowledge & showing support so someone can succeed & soar even higher is the definition of my success. I'm often criticized for it, but it's about my journey, my heart & opening doors. I never regret it!
#USER# Helloooo! Me too... Suffering from exhaustion all week and that's so not me. 😔 Take a nap & rest up for the Warriors, if you'll be watching. 😊

Good Morning... 🦋 "Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you. " ~ Nathaniel Hawthorne Stay beyond the grasp, don't settle. You're a blessing to be appreciated.
I look like a Nike walking billboard today. 😂 Oh well, out the door I go... #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
#USER# Oh Victor...😂😂 Guess what? On a serious note and not far off topic, I just got some news.
#USER# "Many" was the wrong word. 😂 It's just a couple (+) decades. #URL#

#USER# Yay! No more eh...🙃 I fell back to sleep for a little & woke up to sun. But it's chilly... Enjoy playtime!
#USER# #USER# Happy Friday Melanie! Hope you're well. Enjoy a wonderful weekend 🦋

Sharing with you... Happy Sunday Victor! 😊

Growing up my grandpa always said you need to have some basic trade skills. So we built small stuff, painted the house/rooms & did basic car maintenance together.
Walking the houses, the painter says "What the heck? I should hire you."😂 Yeah, my grandpa's smiling down!
